Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.apache.spark.AccumulableParam
    use AccumulatorV2. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.AccumulatorParam
    use AccumulatorV2. Since 2.0.0.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.apache.spark.Accumulable
    use AccumulatorV2. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.Accumulator
    use AccumulatorV2. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.AccumulatorParam.DoubleAccumulatorParam$
    use AccumulatorV2. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.AccumulatorParam.FloatAccumulatorParam$
    use AccumulatorV2. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.AccumulatorParam.IntAccumulatorParam$
    use AccumulatorV2. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.AccumulatorParam.LongAccumulatorParam$
    use AccumulatorV2. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.AccumulatorParam.StringAccumulatorParam$
    use AccumulatorV2. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.sql.hive.HiveContext
    Use SparkSession.builder.enableHiveSupport instead. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.ml.feature.OneHotEncoder
    OneHotEncoderEstimator will be renamed OneHotEncoder and this OneHotEncoder will be removed in 3.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.sql.streaming.ProcessingTime
    use Trigger.ProcessingTime(intervalMs). Since 2.2.0.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description

    use AccumulatorV2. Since 2.0.0.

    use AccumulatorV2. Since 2.0.0.

    use AccumulatorV2. Since 2.0.0.

    use AccumulatorV2. Since 2.0.0.

    use sc().longAccumulator(). Since 2.0.0.

    use AccumulatorV2. Since 2.0.0.

    use AccumulatorV2. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.sql.streaming.ProcessingTime.apply(Duration)
    use Trigger.ProcessingTime(interval)
    org.apache.spark.scheduler.AccumulableInfo.apply(long, String, Option<String>, String)
    do not create AccumulableInfo. Since 2.0.0.

    do not create AccumulableInfo. Since 2.0.0.

    do not create AccumulableInfo. Since 2.0.0.

    use Trigger.ProcessingTime(interval)

    Use createDataFrame instead. Since 1.3.0.

    Use createDataFrame instead. Since 1.3.0.

    Use createDataFrame instead. Since 1.3.0.
    org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext.applySchema(RDD<Row>, StructType)
    Use createDataFrame instead. Since 1.3.0.

    Use approx_count_distinct. Since 2.1.0.
    org.apache.spark.scheduler.StageInfo.attemptId()
    Use attemptNumber instead. Since 2.3.0.
    org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext.clearActive()
    Use SparkSession.clearActiveSession instead. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.ml.clustering.KMeansModel.computeCost(Dataset<?>)
    This method is deprecated and will be removed in 3.0.0. Use ClusteringEvaluator instead. You can also get the cost on the training dataset in the summary.
    org.apache.spark.sql.streaming.ProcessingTime.create(long, TimeUnit)
    use Trigger.ProcessingTime(interval, unit)
    org.apache.spark.sql.streaming.ProcessingTime.create(String)
    use Trigger.ProcessingTime(interval)

    org.apache.spark.sql.Dataset.explode(Seq<Column>, Function1<Row, TraversableOnce<A>>, TypeTags.TypeTag<A>)
    use flatMap() or select() with functions.explode() instead. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.sql.Dataset.explode(String, String, Function1<A, TraversableOnce<B>>, TypeTags.TypeTag<B>)
    use flatMap() or select() with functions.explode() instead. Since 2.0.0.

    Use accuracy. Since 2.0.0.

    Use SparkSession.builder instead. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.mllib.clustering.KMeans.getRuns()
    This has no effect and always returns 1. Since 2.1.0.

    use sc().longAccumulator(). Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaSparkContext.intAccumulator(int, String)
    use sc().longAccumulator(String). Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.TaskContext.isRunningLocally()
    Local execution was removed, so this always returns false. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext.jdbc(String, String)

    As of 1.4.0, replaced by read().format(source).options(options).load().

    As of 1.4.0, replaced by read().format(source).schema(schema).options(options).load().

    Use monotonically_increasing_id(). Since 2.0.0.

    org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext.parquetFile(Seq<String>)
    Use read.parquet() instead. Since 1.4.0.
    org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext.parquetFile(String...)
    As of 1.4.0, replaced by read().parquet().
    org.apache.spark.mllib.evaluation.MulticlassMetrics.precision()
    Use accuracy. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.sql.expressions.Window.rangeBetween(Column, Column)
    Use the version with Long parameter types. Since 2.4.0.
    org.apache.spark.sql.expressions.WindowSpec.rangeBetween(Column, Column)
    Use the version with Long parameter types. Since 2.4.0.
    org.apache.spark.ml.image.ImageSchema.readImages(String)
    use `spark.read.format("image").load(path)` and this `readImages` will be removed in 3.0.0. Since 2.4.0.
    org.apache.spark.ml.image.ImageSchema.readImages(String, SparkSession, boolean, int, boolean, double, long)
    use `spark.read.format("image").load(path)` and this `readImages` will be removed in 3.0.0. Since 2.4.0.
    org.apache.spark.mllib.evaluation.MulticlassMetrics.recall()
    Use accuracy. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.sql.Dataset.registerTempTable(String)
    Use createOrReplaceTempView(viewName) instead. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext.setActive(SQLContext)
    Use SparkSession.setActiveSession instead. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.mllib.clustering.KMeans.setRuns(int)
    This has no effect. Since 2.1.0.
    org.apache.spark.ml.classification.LinearSVCModel.setWeightCol(double)
    This method is deprecated and will be removed in 3.0.0. Since 2.4.4.
    org.apache.spark.sql.functions.toDegrees(Column)
    Use degrees. Since 2.1.0.
    org.apache.spark.sql.functions.toDegrees(String)
    Use degrees. Since 2.1.0.
    org.apache.spark.sql.functions.toRadians(Column)
    Use radians. Since 2.1.0.
    org.apache.spark.sql.functions.toRadians(String)
    Use radians. Since 2.1.0.
    org.apache.spark.mllib.clustering.KMeans.train(RDD<Vector>, int, int, int)
    Use train method without 'runs'. Since 2.1.0.
    org.apache.spark.mllib.clustering.KMeans.train(RDD<Vector>, int, int, int, String)
    Use train method without 'runs'. Since 2.1.0.
    org.apache.spark.mllib.clustering.KMeans.train(RDD<Vector>, int, int, int, String, long)
    Use train method without 'runs'. Since 2.1.0.
    org.apache.spark.sql.functions.unboundedFollowing()
    Use Window.unboundedFollowing. Since 2.4.0.
    org.apache.spark.sql.functions.unboundedPreceding()
    Use Window.unboundedPreceding. Since 2.4.0.
    org.apache.spark.sql.Dataset.unionAll(Dataset<T>)
    use union(). Since 2.0.0.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.apache.spark.mllib.regression.LassoWithSGD()
    Use ml.regression.LinearRegression with elasticNetParam = 1.0. Note the default regParam is 0.01 for LassoWithSGD, but is 0.0 for LinearRegression. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.mllib.regression.LinearRegressionWithSGD()
    Use ml.regression.LinearRegression or LBFGS. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.mllib.classification.LogisticRegressionWithSGD()
    Use ml.classification.LogisticRegression or LogisticRegressionWithLBFGS. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.mllib.regression.RidgeRegressionWithSGD()
    Use ml.regression.LinearRegression with elasticNetParam = 0.0. Note the default regParam is 0.01 for RidgeRegressionWithSGD, but is 0.0 for LinearRegression. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext(JavaSparkContext)
    Use SparkSession.builder instead. Since 2.0.0.
    org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext(SparkContext)
    Use SparkSession.builder instead. Since 2.0.0.
